about_the_game:
There are girls called Majyo(witches) in the world, and this is the story happened between them.

·HOW TO START
The game progresses by linear chapters. Select the chapter to start the game. The new chapter will open when the previous chapter has been cleared. And the cleared chapters can be played again.

·HOW TO PLAY
The main method of play is 2D Barrage Combat (STG). You can control Majyos to move around and defeat enemies. And the Majyos you can control include 3 characters.
When an enemy is defeated, you can get point, by which you can level up Majyos' skill to be stronger.
When all enemies are defeated, the chapter is cleared.

·Features
We provided 3 Majyos for players to use, and each of them has her unique fighting mode.
Enemies also have their own fighting patterns and the BOSS will show special fighting patterns, which will bring crisis and excitement to players.
And it is believed that the excellent music in the game will give players surprise.

·Contents
The game includes totally 10 chapters, in which 8 chapters show main story and 2 chapters are extra chapters.
In the main story, you will meet with 9 characters (Having image), and most of them are cute girls. You will witness the story between them.
